post:
Hi Folks,

The 128MB Plans are now available in the UK and I am kicking them off with a promo.

What you get:

**2 Cores (Equal Share)
128MB Ram
128MB Swap
7GB HDD
300GB Bandwidth @ 100mbit
1 x IPv4**

PROMO CODE: LETDEC128

Order Link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=55

PRICE: €18.00 p/year ($23.22)

**FREE Upgrade choice:

1) Upgrade disk to 10 GB
2) Upgrade Bandwidth to 350 GB**

Enter your upgrade choice (not both) during checkout in the notes or open a ticket, note that disk upgrades will require a reboot.

Test IP: 149.255.111.6
Location: RapidSwitch DC Maidenhead

IPv6 will be available very soon.

Thanks for reading.

Anthony.
